verses.verse: But <S%G1161><s%> I determined <S%G2919><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> with myself <S%G1683><s%>, that I would <S%G2064><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> come <S%G2064><s%> again <S%G3825><s%> to <S%G4314><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaviness <S%G3077><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> I <S%G1473><s%> make <S%G3076><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> sorry <S%G3076><s%>, who <S%G5101><s%> is he <S%G2076><s%> then <S%G2532><s%> that maketh <S%G2165><s%> me <S%G3165><s%> glad <S%G2165><s%>, but <S%G1508><s%> the same which is made sorry <S%G3076><s%> by <S%G1537><s%> me <S%G1700><s%>?

And <S%G2532><s%> I wrote <S%G1125><s%> this <S%G5124><s%> same <S%G846><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%>, lest <S%G3363><s%>, when I came <S%G2064><s%>, I should have <S%G2192><s%> sorrow <S%G3077><s%> from <S%G575><s%> them of whom <S%G3739><s%> I <S%G3165><s%> ought <S%G1163><s%> to rejoice <S%G5463><s%>; having confidence <S%G3982><s%> in <S%G1909><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>, that <S%G3754><s%> my <S%G1699><s%> joy <S%G5479><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the joy of you <S%G5216><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> much <S%G4183><s%> affliction <S%G2347><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> anguish <S%G4928><s%> of heart <S%G2588><s%> I wrote <S%G1125><s%> unto you <S%G5213><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> many <S%G4183><s%> tears <S%G1144><s%>; not <S%G3756><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye should be grieved <S%G3076><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> that <S%G2443><s%> ye might know <S%G1097><s%> the love <S%G26><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> I have <S%G2192><s%> more abundantly <S%G4056><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> you <S%G5209><s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> if any <S%G1536><s%> have caused grief <S%G3076><s%>, he hath <S%G3076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> grieved <S%G3076><s%> me <S%G1691><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> in <S%G575><s%> part <S%G3313><s%>: that <S%G3363><s%> I may <S%G1912><s%> not <S%G3363><s%> overcharge <S%G1912><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> all <S%G3956><s%>.
Sufficient <S%G2425><s%> to such a man <S%G5108><s%> is this <S%G3778><s%> punishment <S%G2009><s%>, which <S%G3588><s%> was inflicted of <S%G5259><s%> many <S%G4119><s%>.

So <S%G5620><s%> that contrariwise <S%G5121><s%> ye <S%G5209><s%> ought rather <S%G3123><s%> to forgive <S%G5483><s%> him, and <S%G2532><s%> comfort <S%G3870><s%> him, lest <S%G3381><s%> perhaps <S%G4458><s%> such a one <S%G5108><s%> should be swallowed up <S%G2666><s%> with overmuch <S%G4055><s%> sorrow <S%G3077><s%>.
Wherefore <S%G1352><s%> I beseech <S%G3870><s%> you <S%G5209><s%> that ye would confirm <S%G2964><s%> your love <S%G26><s%> toward <S%G1519><s%> him <S%G846><s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> this end <S%G5124><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> did I write <S%G1125><s%>, that <S%G2443><s%> I might know <S%G1097><s%> the proof <S%G1382><s%> of you <S%G5216><s%>, whether <S%G1487><s%> ye be <S%G2075><s%> obedient <S%G5255><s%> in <S%G1519><s%> all things <S%G3956><s%>.

<S%G1161><s%>To whom <S%G3739><s%> ye forgive <S%G5483><s%> any thing <S%G5100><s%>, I <S%G1473><s%> forgive also <S%G2532><s%>: for <S%G2532><s%> <S%G1063><s%> if I <S%G1473><s%> forgave <S%G5483><s%> any thing <S%G1536><s%>, to whom <S%G3739><s%> I forgave <S%G5483><s%> it, for your sakes <S%G1223><s%> <S%G5209><s%> forgave I it in <S%G1722><s%> the person <S%G4383><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>;

Lest <S%G3363><s%> Satan <S%G5259><s%> <S%G4567><s%> should get an advantage of us <S%G4122><s%>: for <S%G1063><s%> we are not <S%G3756><s%> ignorant <S%G50><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> devices <S%G3540><s%>.

Furthermore <S%G1161><s%>, when I came <S%G2064><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> Troas <S%G5174><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> preach Christ's <S%G5547><s%> gospel <S%G2098><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> a door <S%G2374><s%> was opened <S%G455><s%> unto me <S%G3427><s%> of <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%>,

I had <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> rest <S%G425><s%> in my <S%G3450><s%> spirit <S%G4151><s%>, because I <S%G3165><s%> found <S%G2147><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> Titus <S%G5103><s%> my <S%G3450><s%> brother <S%G80><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> taking my leave <S%G657><s%> of them <S%G846><s%>, I went from thence <S%G1831><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> Macedonia <S%G3109><s%>.

Now <S%G1161><s%> thanks <S%G5485><s%> be unto God <S%G2316><s%>, which always <S%G3842><s%> causeth <S%G2358><s%> us <S%G2248><s%> to triumph <S%G2358><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> maketh manifest <S%G5319><s%> the savour <S%G3744><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> knowledge <S%G1108><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> us <S%G2257><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> place <S%G5117><s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> unto God <S%G2316><s%> a sweet savour <S%G2175><s%> of Christ <S%G5547><s%>, in <S%G1722><s%> them that are saved <S%G4982><s%>, and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> them that perish <S%G622><s%>:

To <S%G3739><s%> the one <S%G3303><s%> we are the savour <S%G3744><s%> of death <S%G2288><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>; and <S%G1161><s%> to the other <S%G3739><s%> the savour <S%G3744><s%> of life <S%G2222><s%> unto <S%G1519><s%> life <S%G2222><s%>. And <S%G2532><s%> who <S%G5101><s%> is sufficient <S%G2425><s%> for <S%G4314><s%> these things <S%G5023><s%>?

For <S%G1063><s%> we are <S%G2070><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> many <S%G4183><s%>, which corrupt <S%G2585><s%> the word <S%G3056><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%>: but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> sincerity <S%G1505><s%>, but <S%G235><s%> as <S%G5613><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> God <S%G2316><s%>, in the sight <S%G2714><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> speak we <S%G2980><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%>.
